attributes.action: Partition Bashar al-Assad to end inhumane treatment of detained Syrian prisoners
attributes.background: Currently President Bashar al-Assad is detaining Syrians and keeping them under inhumane conditions, they are exposed to physical and mental torture. Many of the detained are simply protesters.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Your petition seems to be calling on President Bashar al-Assad, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
